text: wbbakh allah jll jlalh jamaeat min almunafiqin astadhnu rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam fi altkhlf ean ghzw (tbwk) mbynana 'anah law kan khurujihim 'iilaa ghnymt qaribat sahlatan almanal latbewk, wlkn lamaa dueuu 'iilaa qital alruwm fy atraf bilad (alsham) fi waqt alhuri tkhadhlu, wtkhlfu, wsyetdhrwn ltkhlfhm ean alkhuruj halfyn bi'anahum la yastatieun dhlk, yuhlikun 'anfusahum balkdhb walnfaq, wallah yaelam 'iinahum lakadhibun fima yubdun lak min alaedhar
